title: #85: Wikipedia’s Hush Money | Helen Buyniski
description:
Helen of desTroy joins the program to shed light on the dark influence and questionable financial ties of one of the most well-known resources for information on the planet: Wikipedia.

Helen explains who this organization actually is, and how they use an echo chamber of “authoritative sources” to bolster their credibility and make lies become truths.

Also, as the soul of New York City is slowly poisoned by outrageous and contradictory directives from two of the most corrupt governors and mayors in the world, what happens once the property values have been destroyed and the people have been driven away? A feeding frenzy of corporate vultures from Wall Street is on the horizon unless the people of NYC stand up and take their city back.
